issue.title: [Gandiva][Crossbow] Trusty build broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4358](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4358). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a side effect of <https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/1b8a7bc3baa4bce660c18a13934115d55f8733df,> java builds on trusty are broken due to removal of travis maven in this commit.

This Jira is to support both environments..
